description: This file contains the implementation of the RialtoConnector class, handling session management including creation, activation, suspension, deactivation, and state change notifications within the Rialto media framework. It interfaces with external components via method calls and manages internal application states.

classes.name: RialtoConnector
classes.description: A class responsible for managing application sessions and their states within the Rialto framework, including creation, suspension, resumption, deactivation, and handling state change notifications.

methods.name: void initialize()
methods.description: Initializes the Rialto connector, setting up internal configurations and creating the server manager service instance.

methods.name: bool createAppSession(const std::string & callsign,const std::string & displayName,const std::string & appId)
methods.description: Creates a new application session with provided callsign, display name, and app ID, and initiates the application through the server manager service.

methods.name: bool resumeSession(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Resumes an inactive session identified by callsign by changing its state to active.

methods.name: bool suspendSession(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Suspends an active session identified by callsign by changing its state to inactive.

methods.name: const RialtoServerStates getCurrentAppState(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of the application identified by callsign.

methods.name: bool deactivateSession(const std::string & callsign)
methods.description: Deactivates the application session if it is active or inactive.

methods.name: void stateChanged(const std::string & appId,const RialtoServerStates & state)
methods.description: Updates internal mapping and notifies registered listeners of a change in session state.

methods.name: bool waitForStateChange(const std::string & appId,const RialtoServerStates & state,int timeoutMillis)
methods.description: Blocks until the application reaches the specified state or the timeout expires.

ctags.name: createAppSession
ctags.signature: (const std::string & callsign,const std::string & displayName,const std::string & appId)

ctags.name: waitForStateChange
ctags.pattern: /^    bool RialtoConnector::waitForStateChange(const std::string& appId, const RialtoServerStates&/
